node.title: Photos: Inside the Russian invasion of Ukraine
node.description: Ukrainians are resisting Russia's attack, fighting with heavy ammo, homemade weapons and grit.
node.content: ["Developments in the Russian invasion of Ukraine seem to evolve by the hour. After months of failed diplomacy, weapons build-ups\u00a0and saber-rattling by Russian President Vladimir Putin, Russia launched an attack on its western neighbor on February 24. Since then, much of the world has watched \u2014 and lent support in the form of condemnations, ammunition and sanctions \u2014 as Ukrainians have resisted with everything they have.", "Here's a look at the ongoing fighting in Ukraine, as well as a snapshot of what life is like for Ukrainians fleeing the violence.", "Here, a local resident prepares Molotov cocktails to defend the city of Uzhhorod, after Russia launched a massive military operation in that city, February 27, 2022.", "Warning: Some photos in this gallery depict slain fighters and other images that may be disturbing."]
